definition: to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: They say the nightingale pierces his bosom with a thorn when he sings his love song.
sentences.chinese: 他们说夜莺唱出恋歌时，用荆棘刺穿自己的胸膛。

sentences.english: I am willing to total spectrum lasting love song.
sentences.chinese: 我愿与你共谱矢志不移的恋歌。

sentences.english: His poetry collection The Love Song for Mountains was awarded The First National Outstanding New Poetry Prize.
sentences.chinese: 其中诗集《山的恋歌》获第一届全国优秀新诗奖。

sentences.english: Caressing your cascading long hair, singing a love song in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 把你那如瀑的长发轻轻撩动，为你唱一曲风的恋歌。

sentences.english: They said that when the Nightingale sang Love Song to stab himself headlong into the heart chamber.
sentences.chinese: 他们说夜莺唱着恋歌的时候，把刺扎进自己的心膛。

sentences.english: After "Winter Love Song" he advanced to the movie world in Korea.
sentences.chinese: 在《冬季恋歌》之后，他朝著韩国电影界进军。

definition: in love with/to feel deeply attached to
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
